Description: Bracelet; gold; one of a pair; spiral, in the form of a snake, with undulating tail; cross-hatching to head and end of tail; head features incised.
Curator's comments: Published: L. Wamser, Die Welt von Byzanz - Europas ostliches Erbe - Glanz, Krisen, und Fortleben einer tausendjahrigen Kultur, Munich, 2004, no. 497. Pair with 1916,0714.5
Bibliographic references: Tait 1986a / Seven Thousand Years of Jewellery (222)
Dennison 1918 / A Gold Treasure of the Late Roman Period from Egypt (25)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2004 21 Oct-2005 3 Apr, Germany, Munich, Archäologische Staatssammlung, The World of Byzantium
